availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Ryan (Serg. and 2nd Lieut. 5th Ky. Vol. Inf)

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Served in the 5th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as sergeant and second lieutenant from September 9, 1861. Died at the Battle of Chickamauga on September 25, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 694-5.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0199.
